review.description: I love this deli ! They are friendly and the food is great ... I love  their salads, for a small it's 8.66 with unlimited toppings ...great sandwiches, wraps and hot meal section as well. They are under new management and renovated the deli. A bright and open space now.
review.author: S S.

review.description: DO NOT GO TO HIS DELI!  I walked in to ask for a book of matches.  The guy wanted to charge me five cents!  I know five cents is not a lot...but who charges for matches??    I've lived in New York all my life and never heard of something so ridiculous!  The owner should be ashamed!!  Not a good business tactic.  Lost this costumer for life!
review.author: Jewels M.
